headline: Classic Goulash
name: Classic Goulash
description: This goulash recipe is made on the stovetop with ground beef, tomatoes, herbs, and mararoni for a classic one-pot meal the whole family will enjoy.
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon seasoned salt, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook 3 minutes, stirring often. Add ground beef and cook, breaking up the meat until it is evenly browned, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook 3 minutes, stirring often.
Stir in water, tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, soy sauce, Italian seasoning, seasoned salt, and bay leaves. Bring to a simmer, cover and cook 5 minutes, stirring halfway through.
Stir in uncooked macaroni, cover, and simmer over medium heat until pasta is tender, 11 to 13 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat, discard bay leaves, and serve.
